education_excellence: High school education excellence we are happy to connect with you in whatever way you are most comfortable
start_courses_description: Welcome to the beginning of the 2024 academic year at Collège international le pieux. We're excited to start our courses and begin a journey of learning, growth, and success together.

choose_section.heading: Why choose Collège international le pieux?

card1.title: Education Excellence
card1.description: We offer the best education to our students, ensuring they have access to a diverse range of learning resources and opportunities.

card2.title: We keep our students happy
card2.description: Our students are always happy because of the lectures with strong knowledge and experiences.

card3.title: Our Mission
card3.description: Collège international le pieux is committed to providing quality technical education, fostering innovation, and promoting entrepreneurship among its students.

faq_section.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq_section.description: In our institution, we offer a wide range of courses across various subjects, including but not limited to mathematics, science, language arts, social studies, fine arts, and physical education. Our curriculum is designed to provide students with a well-rounded education that prepares them for future success.

faq.title: How do I enroll my child?
faq.description: To enroll your child at Lepieux international school, please visit our admissions page on our website or contact our admissions office directly. Our team will guide you through the enrollment process and answer any questions you may have.
faq.question: What classes do we offer?
faq.answer: We offer different subjects like math, science, language arts, social studies, arts, and physical education to give students a well-rounded education.
faq.2title: How does Lepieux international school keep students safe and happy?
faq.2answer: We have rules, security, counseling, and health programs in place to make sure all students feel safe and supported.
faq.3title: How can I know about school events and news?
faq.3answer: Check our website, follow us on social media, or sign up for emails to stay updated. We might also send notices home or call you with important updates.

testimonials.name: ishimwe sandra
testimonials.text: I'm always happy to study at this school because the skills that I gain at school are enough for me. They have the best education I've ever seen.

courses.title: Veterinary and Agronomy
courses.description: Would you like to build your career in Veterinary and Agronomy? This course explores veterinary science and agronomy, covering topics such as animal health, nutrition, breeding, crop production, and soil management.

courses.title: Construction
courses.description: Would you like to build your career in construction? This course covers the principles and techniques of construction, including building materials, structural systems, construction methods, and project management.

courses.title: Mechanical
courses.description: Build your future career in Mechanical. This course covers principles of mechanics, including statics, dynamics, kinematics, and mechanical systems, and their applications in engineering and technology.

courses.title: General electricity
courses.description: This course covers fundamental principles and applications of general electricity, including circuits, voltage, current, resistance, and power.

courses.title: Sales and Management
courses.description: This course focuses on commercial and management skills, including marketing, sales, finance, human resources, and business operations.

blogs.title: Build your career in general electricity
blogs.description: Explore the possibilities of building a career in general electricity. From electrical installation to maintenance, the field offers diverse opportunities for those with a passion for hands-on work and problem-solving. Join us as we illuminate the path to a rewarding career in this dynamic industry.

blogs.title: Build your Career in electronics
blogs.description: Looking to build a career in electronics? Dive into a world of endless possibilities where you can innovate, create, and shape the future of technology. Whether you're interested in designing circuits, troubleshooting systems, or developing cutting-edge gadgets,

blogs.title: Build your Career in sales management
blogs.description: Explore the dynamic opportunities available in these sectors where you can lead, strategize, and drive success. Whether you're drawn to sales, marketing, finance, or operations, commercial and management roles offer diverse pathways for growth and impact.

blogs.title: Build your career  in Mechanical
blogs.description: Interested in a hands-on career? Consider becoming a mechanic! Dive into the world of fixing, maintaining, and tinkering with vehicles and machinery. Whether you're drawn to cars, trucks, airplanes, or industrial equipment, a career in mechanics offers endless opportunities to work with your hands and solve problems

blogs.title: Build your career in construction
blogs.description: Looking to build a solid career? Consider construction! Dive into a world of building, shaping, and creating structures that define our cities and communities. Whether you're interested in hands-on work like carpentry and masonry,.

blogs.title: build your career in veterinary and agronomy
blogs.description: Explore the endless possibilities in the world of technology, where you can innovate, problem-solve, and shape the digital landscape. Whether you're passionate about software development, cybersecurity, data analytics.

footer.main_address: Main Address - Congo Drc. Kalemie 540 Street

about.title: About Us
about.description: Collège international Lepieux is a leading secondary educational institution located in the city of Kalemie, Democratic Republic of Congo, dedicated to providing high-quality technical education to students. Our institute aims to equip students with the skills and knowledge to excel in various technical fields, promoting personal and professional growth. We offer a comprehensive curriculum, state-of-the-art facilities, and a supportive learning environment to ensure our students receive the best education possible.
about.studyDescription1: Discover the rich tapestry of learning experiences waiting for you within our institution.
about.studyDescription2: Experience the transformative power of expert-led education, shaping minds and futures.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: If you would like to get updates on our events and stay in contact with us, please don't hesitate. Just reach out to us; we are here to help you.

shortcourses.title: Networking and telecomunication
shortcourses.description: Discover networking essentials in this 6-month course covering architecture, protocols, and communication systems.

shortcourses.title: cut and seam
shortcourses.description: For a hands-on experience, enroll in our 6-month 'Cut and Seam' course. Learn the art of precision cutting and expert seam techniques.

shortcourses.title: Adjustment and welding
shortcourses.description: Join our 6-month 'Adjustment and Welding' course to master construction principles and techniques. Explore building materials, structural systems, construction methods, and project management essentials.

shortcourses.title: Adult rehabilitation school
shortcourses.description: Embark on a 6-month journey at our Adult Rehabilitation School. Gain expertise in commercial and management skills, covering marketing, sales, finance, human resources, and business operations

shortcourses.title: Domestic and industrial installation
shortcourses.description: Explore mechanics in our 6-month 'Domestic and Industrial Installation' course. Learn statics, dynamics, kinematics, and mechanical systems, applied in engineering and technology

shortcourses.title: Masonary and plumbing
shortcourses.description: Enroll in our 6-month 'Masonry and Plumbing' course, diving into the essentials of construction and water systems. Learn masonry techniques alongside plumbing principles, preparing you for diverse projects in the field.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Welcome to our blog on building a career in computing! Explore the diverse opportunities and pathways available in the ever-evolving world of technology, alongside other related fields.

short.title: our short courses
short.description: We offer a range of short courses in various fields each spanning approximately six months and conducted through in-person construction
